intro: The v-btn component can be used as a floating action button. This provides an application with a main point of action. Combined with the v-speed-dial component, you can create a diverse set of functions available for your users.

animation.heading: Display animation
animation.intro: When displaying for the first time, a floating action button should animate onto the screen. Here we use the v-fab-transition with v-show. You can also use any custom transition provided by Vuetify or your own.

lateral.heading: Lateral screens
lateral.intro: When changing the default action of your button, it is recommended that you display a transition to signify a change. We do this by binding the key prop to a piece of data that can properly signal a change in action to the Vue transition system. While you can use a custom transition for this, ensure that you set the mode prop to out-in.

variant.heading: Small variant
variant.intro: For better visual appeal, we use a small button to match our list avatars.

speed.heading: Speed dial
speed.intro: The speed-dial component has an very robust api for customizing your FAB experience exactly how you want.
